MAPDEV.text:
TITLE 'MAPDEV - TABLE OF DEVICE CONSTANTS'
***********************************************************************
*
*  FOLLOWING ZAPS INTEGRATED IN SOURCE:
*      ZAP3  -  3350 SUPPORT
*      ZAP4  -  3375 SUPPORT
*      ZAP5  -  3380 SUPPORT
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  FOLLOWING ENHANCEMENTS HAVE BEEN ADDED IN SOURCE:
*      1.  3390'S HAVE BEEN ADDED
*      2.  TABLE ORDERED IN DECREASING DEVICE CODE (NEWEST FIRST)
*      3.  CONSTANTS ARE NOT USED ANY MORE. MAPINIT GETS INFO FROM
*          THE SYSTEM DEVTYPE SERVICE.
*
*   18MAY92   ADD ANOTHER FIELD TO TABLE TO LIST NUMBER OF ALTERNATE
*             CYLINDERS, SINCE THIS IS INCLUDED IN THE COUNT RETURNED
*             BY DEVTYPE.
*   04AUG92   CHANGE FUNCTION. MAKE ACTIVE CSECT. CALL VIA R14, WITH
*             R1 CONTAINING TYPE CODE (ALL 4 BYTES OR JUST LAST BYTE).
*             WILL RETURN WITH POINTER TO CONSTANTS BLOCK IN R1.
*
***********************************************************************
*
* EACH ENTRY OF THE TABLE IN MAPDEV IS FORMATTED AS FOLLOWS:
*
*             FIELD NAME                      BYTES
*      DEVICE TYPE                              0
*      DEVICE DESCRIPTION                      1-15
*      SCALE FACTORS FOR CCHH OF DEVICE       16-23
*        FACTOR TO CONVERT REL-TRACK TO CCHH    16-17
*             (THIS IS USED FOR DEVICE THAT
*              HAVE HH AS A SINGLE NUMBER,
*              OTHERWISE SHOULD BE ZERO)
*             (THIS IS REALLY TRACKS PER CYL
*              FOR NORMAL DEVICES)
*        FACTOR TO CONVERT CC TO REL-TRACK      18-19
*             (THIS IS USED FOR DEVICES THAT
*              SPLIT THE FUNCTION OF HH INTO
*              H(1), AND H(2) WHICH THEN HAVE
*              DIFFERENT MEANINGS
*             (THIS IS REALLY TRACKS PER CYL
*              FOR NORMAL DEVICES)
*        FACTOR TO CONVERT H(1) TO REL-TRACK    20-21
*             (SHOULD BE ZERO IF H(1) NOT
*              USED)
*        FACTOR TO CONVERT H(2) TO REL-TRACK    22-23
*             (IN CONVERSIONFROM REL-TRACK TO
*              CCHH, THIS IS ASSUMED TO BE '1')
*      NUMBER OF TRACKS PER CYLINDER          24-25
*      MAX RELATIVE TRACK FOR DEVICE          26-27
*      NUMBER OF ALTERNATE CYLINDERS          28-29             18MAY92
*
***********************************************************************
MAPDEV   CSECT
         ENTRY MDVPATCH
         ENTRY MDEVEND
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)         SAVE REGISTERS           04AUG92
         LR    R12,R15                 SET NEW BASE REGISTER    04AUG92
         USING MAPDEV,R12              SETUP ADDRESSABILITY     04AUG92
         LA    R2,MAPDEVT              POINT AT TABLE           04AUG92
MD1      EX    R1,MDCLI                MATCH DEVICETYPE+3?      04AUG92
         BE    MD2                     FOUND OK ENTRY           04AUG92
         CLI   0(R2),X'FF'             END OF TABLE?            04AUG92
         BE    MD2                     IS UNKNOWN ENTRY         04AUG92
         LA    R2,MDENTLN(,R2)         GO TO NEXT ENTRY         04AUG92
         B     MD1                     LOOP AGAIN               04AUG92
MDCLI    CLI   0(R2),*-*               **EXECUTED**             04AUG92
MD2      ST    R2,12+4+4+4(R13)        SAVE IN R1 SLOT          04AUG92
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)         RESTORE REGISTERS        04AUG92
         BR    R14                                              04AUG92
         DROP  R12                                              04AUG92
*
MAPDEVT  DC    X'0F'
         DC    C'3390  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'15,15,1,1,15,16680,1'
MDENTLN  EQU   *-MAPDEVT                                        04AUG92
*
         DC    X'0E'
         DC    C'3380  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'15,15,1,1,15,13275,1'
*
         DC    X'0D'
         DC    C'3330-1 DISK    '
         DC    H'19,19,1,1,19,15352,7'
*
         DC    X'0C'
         DC    C'3375  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'12,12,1,1,12,11508,0'
*
         DC    X'0B'
         DC    C'3350  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'30,30,1,1,30,16650,5'
*
         DC    X'0A'
         DC    C'3340  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'12,12,1,1,12,4176,1'
*
         DC    X'09'
         DC    C'3330  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'19,19,1,1,19,7676,7'
*
         DC    X'08'
         DC    C'2314  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'0,20,1,1,20,4000,0'
*
         DC    X'07'
         DC    C'2305-2 DISK    '
         DC    H'0,8,0,1,8,768,0'
*
         DC    X'06'
         DC    C'2305-1 DISK    '
         DC    H'0,8,0,1,8,384,0'
*
         DC    X'05'
         DC    C'2321  DATA CELL'
         DC    H'0,46,0,1,46,11500,0'
*
         DC    X'04'
         DC    C'2302  DISK FILE'
         DC    H'0,46,0,1,46,11500,0'
*
         DC    X'03'
         DC    C'2303  DRUM     '
         DC    H'0,10,0,1,10,800,0'
*
         DC    X'02'
         DC    C'2301  DRUM     '
         DC    H'0,8,0,1,8,200,0'
*
         DC    X'01'
         DC    C'2311  DISK PACK'
         DC    H'0,10,0,1,10,2000,0'
MDEVEND  EQU   *
         DC    X'FF'                                            04AUG92
         DC    C'UNKNOWN DEVICE '         HOPEFULLY SUPPLIED    04AUG92
         DC    H'15,15,1,1,15,16680,1'           BY DEVTYP      04AUG92
MDVPATCH EQU   *
         DC    5XL(MDENTLN)'00'           SPACE FOR MORE        04AUG92
         REQU  ,                                                04AUG92
         END

MAPGRES.text:
MAPGRES  CSECT
***********************************************************************
*
*   CSECT DISASSEMBLED FROM IEHMAPIN TO ADD XA LEVEL CODE
*
*   PURPOSE OF THE ROUTINE IS APPARENTLY TO FIND THE IPL VOLUME
*   UCB ADDRESS
*
*   APPARENT EXIT CONDITIONS
*     R15=0   UCB FOUND  R1=UCB ADDRESS
*     R15=4   UCB NOT FOUND
*
*   GUY ALBERTELLI   5/3/86
*
*   FIXED FOR UCBSCAN LOOKUP TO FIND DYNAMIC UCBS.    S.GOLOB  8/28/95
*     ACTION DEPENDS ON THE LEVEL OF THE RUNNING SYSTEM.
*
***********************************************************************
         ENTRY GETSYSRS
         USING *,R12
GETSYSRS EQU   *
A000000  SAVE  (14,12),,'MAPGRES  &SYSDATE &SYSTIME'             GLA-XA
         BAL   R14,552(,R6)                PERFORM
         NOPR  R0
         LR    R12,R15
         L     R1,16                       CVT ADDRESS
CVTDCB   EQU   X'74'               CVT OPERATING SYSTEM TYPE     GLA-XA
         TM    CVTDCB(R1),X'93'    IS THIS XA                    GLA-XA
         BO    NEWXA               YES                           GLA-XA
         L     R2,40(R1)
         LA    R3,2
         L     R15,1068(,R11)
A000038  LH    R1,0(R2)
         LTR   R1,R1
         BZ    A000060
         NOPR  R0
         CL    R1,1552(,R11)
         BE    A000070
         NR    R1,R15
         NOPR  R0
         TM    18(R1),X'20'                IS THIS DASD UCB
         BZ    A000060
         TM    3(R1),X'02'                 IS THIS IPL VOLUME
         BO    A000068
A000060  ALR   R2,R3
         B     A000038
         NOPR  R0
A000068  SLR   R15,R15
         B     744(,R6)
         NOPR  R0
A000070  LA    R7,92
         BAL   R14,1168(,R6)               PERFORM
         LA    R15,4
         B     744(,R6)
*****************************************************************GLA-XA
*                                                                GLA-XA
*        XA CODE TO FIND UCB ADDRESS                             GLA-XA
*                                                                GLA-XA
*****************************************************************GLA-XA
CVTOSLV0 EQU   X'4F0'              FIRST OS LEVEL FLAG IN CVT    SG-ESA
NEWXA    DS    0H                                                GLA-XA
         L     R4,16                       CVT ADDRESS           SG-ESA
         TM    CVTDCB(R4),X'9B'    IS THIS ESA                   SG-ESA
         BNO   DOXARTNE            NO. DO THE XA ROUTINE         SG-ESA
         TM    CVTOSLV0(R4),X'08'  ARE UCB SERVICES AVAILABLE?   SG-ESA
         BO    NEWESA              USE UCB SCAN ROUTINE          SG-ESA
DOXARTNE DS    0H                  XA OR ESA RELEASE 3           SG-ESA
         GETMAIN R,LV=116          GET WORK AREA                 GLA-XA
         LR    R5,R1               SAVE ITS ADDRESS              GLA-XA
         L     R4,16               ADDRESS OF CVT                GLA-XA
CVTUCBSC EQU   X'434'              IOSLOOKUP RTN (XA-ONLY)       GLA-XA
         L     R4,CVTUCBSC(R4)     LOOKUP ROUTINE ADDRESS        GLA-XA
         XC    0(116,R5),0(R5)     CLEAR WORK AREA               GLA-XA
         ST    R5,100(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         LA    R1,=X'20'           SPECIFY ONLY DASD             GLA-XA
         ST    R1,104(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         LA    R1,112(R5)          WORD TO PUT ADDRESS OF UCB    GLA-XA
         ST    R1,108(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         OI    108(R5),X'80'       31 BIT PARM END SET           GLA-XA
UCBLOOP1 LA    R1,100(R5)          POINT AT PARM LIST            GLA-XA
         LR    R15,R4              GET MODULE ADDRESS            GLA-XA
         BALR  R14,R15             CALL MVS                      GLA-XA
         LTR   R15,R15             ANY ERROR                     GLA-XA
         BNZ   UCBNFND             IF ANY THEN NO IPL VOLUME ??? GLA-XA
         L     R1,112(R5)          GET ADDR OF UCB               GLA-XA
         TM    3(R1),X'02'         IPL VOLUME                    GLA-XA
         BZ    UCBLOOP1            NO SO SKIP TO NEXT            GLA-XA
UCBFND   LR    R2,R1               SAVEADDRESS                   GLA-XA
         FREEMAIN R,LV=116,A=(5)   FREE SPACE                    GLA-XA
         LR    R1,R2               RESTORE ADDRESS               GLA-XA
         B     A000068             GO AND EXIT NORMALLY          GLA-XA
UCBNFND  FREEMAIN R,LV=116,A=(5)   FREE SPACE                    GLA-XA
         B     A000070             IF ANY THEN NO IPL VOLUME ??? GLA-XA
*****************************************************************SG-ESA
*                                                                SG-ESA
*        ESA CODE TO FIND UCB ADDRESS                            SG-ESA
*      (COMMENTED CODE ASSEMBLES ON MVS/ESA 4.3.0 OR LATER)      SG-ESA
*      ( THIS IS INCLUDED SO YOU CAN SEE THE LOGIC....)          SG-ESA
*                                                                SG-ESA
*****************************************************************SG-ESA
*                                                                SG-ESA
*NEWESA   DS    0H                                               SG-ESA
*         GETMAIN R,LV=WKLEN                                     SG-ESA
*         LR    R5,R1                                            SG-ESA
*         USING WKAREA,R5                                        SG-ESA
*****************************************************************SG-ESA
**        SCAN UCB                                              *SG-ESA
*****************************************************************SG-ESA
*RESCANLP DS    0H                                               SG-ESA
*         IOCINFO IOCTOKEN=TOKEN,MF=(E,IOCINFP)                  SG-ESA
*         XC    SCANWORK,SCANWORK                                SG-ESA
*UCBLOOP  DS    0H                                               SG-ESA
****    PLACE CONTINUATION CHARACTER IN THE MACRO....            SG-ESA
*         UCBSCAN UCBAREA=UCBCOPY,WORKAREA=SCANWORK,DYNAMIC=YES, S
*               DEVCLASS=DASD,IOCTOKEN=TOKEN,MF=(E,UCBSLST)      SG-ESA
*         LTR   R15,R15           WAS A UCB RETURNED?            SG-ESA
*         BNZ   EUCBNFND          ERROR-THEN REPORT NO IPL VOLUMESG-ESA
*         LA    R1,UCBCOPY        ADDRESSABILITY TO UCBCOPY      SG-ESA
*         USING UCBCMSEG,R1       UCB COMMON SEGMENT DSECT       SG-ESA
*         TM    UCBSTAT,UCBSYSR   IPL VOLUME?                    SG-ESA
*         BZ    UCBLOOP           NO.  SKIP TO NEXT              SG-ESA
*EUCBFND  LR    R2,R1             SAVE ADDRESS                   SG-ESA
*         FREEMAIN R,LV=WKLEN,A=(5)                              SG-ESA
*         LR    R1,R2             RESTORE ADDRESS                SG-ESA
*         B     A000068           GO AND EXIT NORMALLY           SG-ESA
*EUCBNFND FREEMAIN R,LV=WKLEN,A=(5)                              SG-ESA
*         B     A000070           REPORT NO IPL VOLUME           SG-ESA
*WKAREA   DSECT                                                  SG-ESA
*WORKXX   DS    0F                                               SG-ESA
*UCBLIS   UCBSCAN MF=(L,UCBSLST)                                 SG-ESA
*IOCINF   IOCINFO MF=(L,IOCINFP)                                 SG-ESA
*TOKEN    DS    CL48                                             SG-ESA
*UCBCOPY  DS    CL48                                             SG-ESA
*SCANWORK DS    CL100                                            SG-ESA
*WKLEN    EQU   *-WORKXX                                         SG-ESA
* ------------------------------------------------------------- *SG-ESA
*     THE FOLLOWING ESA CODE ASSEMBLES ON LOWER LEVEL SYSTEMS.  *SG-ESA
* ------------------------------------------------------------- *SG-ESA
NEWESA   DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
         GETMAIN R,LV=352                                        SG-ESA
         LR    R5,R1            SAVE ADDRESS OF GETMAINED STG    SG-ESA
         USING WKAREA,R5                                         SG-ESA
RESCANLP DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
*     EXPANSION OF IOCINFO MF=(E,IOCINFP),IOCTOKEN=TOKEN         SG-ESA
M00M0010 DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
         LA    1,IOCINFP        LOCATE ARG PARMS                 SG-ESA
         XC    0(36,1),0(1)     INITIALIZE                       SG-ESA
         MVI   0(1),1           INPUT XVERSION XL1               SG-ESA
         LA    14,TOKEN         OUTPUT XIOCTOKEN A               SG-ESA
         ST    14,4(,1)         OUTPUT XIOCTOKEN A               SG-ESA
         OI    24(1),B'10000000'   OUTPUT BL1                    SG-ESA
         LA    0,7              SET IOCINFO FUNCTION CODE        SG-ESA
         L     14,16(0,0)       GET CVT ADDRESS                  SG-ESA
         L     14,772(14,0)     GET SFT ADDRESS                  SG-ESA
         L     14,312(14,0)     GET LX/EX FOR UCB SERVICES       SG-ESA
         PC    0(14)            PC TO UCB SERVICES               SG-ESA
*     END OF EXPANSION                                           SG-ESA
         XC    SCANWORK,SCANWORK     CLEAR WORK AREA             SG-ESA
UCBLOOP  DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
*     EXPANSION OF UCBSCAN MACRO                                 SG-ESA
M00M0011 DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
         LA    1,UCBSLST        LOCATE ARG PARMS                 SG-ESA
         XC    0(116,1),0(1)    INITIALIZE                       SG-ESA
         MVI   0(1),1           INPUT VERSION XL1                SG-ESA
         LA    14,UCBCOPY       INPUT XUCBAREA A                 SG-ESA
         ST    14,4(,1)         INPUT XUCBAREA A                 SG-ESA
         LA    14,SCANWORK      INOUT XWORKAREA A                SG-ESA
         ST    14,12(,1)        INOUT XWORKAREA A                SG-ESA
         MVC   66(2,1),=FL2'0'  INPUT XDCELEN XL2                SG-ESA
         LA    14,TOKEN         INOUT XIOCTOKEN A                SG-ESA
         ST    14,88(,1)        INOUT XIOCTOKEN A                SG-ESA
         MVI   96(1),32         INPUT XDEVCLASS AL1              SG-ESA
         OI    97(1),B'10100000'   INPUT BL1                     SG-ESA
         LA    0,2              SET UCBSCAN FUNCTION CODE        SG-ESA
         L     14,16(0,0)       GET CVT ADDRESS                  SG-ESA
         L     14,772(14,0)     GET SFT ADDRESS                  SG-ESA
         L     14,312(14,0)     GET LX/EX FOR UCB SERVICES       SG-ESA
         PC    0(14)            PC TO UCB SERVICES               SG-ESA
*     END OF EXPANSION                                           SG-ESA
         LTR   R15,R15          WAS A UCB RETURNED ?             SG-ESA
         BNZ   EUCBNFND         ERROR - REPORT NO IPL VOLUME     SG-ESA
         LA    R1,UCBCOPY       ADDRESSABILITY TO UCBCOPY        SG-ESA
         TM    3(R1),X'02'      IS THIS IPL VOLUME ?             SG-ESA
         BZ    UCBLOOP          NO.  SKIP TO NEXT                SG-ESA
EUCBFND  LR    R2,R1            SAVE ADDRESS                     SG-ESA
         FREEMAIN R,LV=352,A=(5)                                 SG-ESA
         LR    R1,R2            RESTORE ADDRESS                  SG-ESA
         B     A000068          GO AND EXIT NORMALLY             SG-ESA
EUCBNFND FREEMAIN R,LV=352,A=(5)                                 SG-ESA
         B     A000070          REPORT NO IPL VOLUME             SG-ESA
WKAREA   DSECT                                                   SG-ESA
WORKXX   DS    0F                                                SG-ESA
*     EXPANSION OF UCBSCAN - LIST VERSION                        SG-ESA
UCBLIS   DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
UCBSLST  DS    0D               UCBSCAN PARM LIST                SG-ESA
         DS    CL116                                             SG-ESA
UCBSLSTL EQU   *-UCBSLST        LENGTH OF PLIST                  SG-ESA
*     END OF EXPANSION                                           SG-ESA
*     EXPANSION OF IOCINFO - LIST VERSION                        SG-ESA
IOCINF   DS    0H                                                SG-ESA
IOCINFP  DS    0D               IOCINFO PARM LIST                SG-ESA
         DS    CL36                                              SG-ESA
IOCINFPL EQU   *-IOCINFP        LENGTH OF PLIST                  SG-ESA
*     END OF EXPANSION                                           SG-ESA
TOKEN    DS    CL48                                              SG-ESA
UCBCOPY  DS    CL48                                              SG-ESA
SCANWORK DS    CL100                                             SG-ESA
WKLEN    EQU   *-WORKXX                                          SG-ESA
R0       EQU   0                                                 GLA-XA
R1       EQU   1                                                 GLA-XA
R2       EQU   2                                                 GLA-XA
R3       EQU   3                                                 GLA-XA
R4       EQU   4                                                 GLA-XA
R5       EQU   5                                                 GLA-XA
R6       EQU   6                                                 GLA-XA
R7       EQU   7                                                 GLA-XA
R8       EQU   8                                                 GLA-XA
R9       EQU   9                                                 GLA-XA
R10      EQU   10                                                GLA-XA
R11      EQU   11                                                GLA-XA
R12      EQU   12                                                GLA-XA
R13      EQU   13                                                GLA-XA
R14      EQU   14                                                GLA-XA
R15      EQU   15                                                GLA-XA
         IEFUCBOB                                                SG-ESA
         END

MAPGRESO.text:
MAPGRES  CSECT
***********************************************************************
*
*   CSECT DISASSEMBLED FROM IEHMAPIN TO ADD XA LEVEL CODE
*
*   PURPOSE OF THE ROUTINE IS APPARENTLY TO FIND THE IPL VOLUME
*   UCB ADDRESS
*
*   APPARENT EXIT CONDITIONS
*     R15=0   UCB FOUND  R1=UCB ADDRESS
*     R15=4   UCB NOT FOUND
*
*   GUY ALBERTELLI   5/3/86
*
***********************************************************************
         ENTRY GETSYSRS
         USING *,R12
GETSYSRS EQU   *
A000000  SAVE  (14,12),,'MAPGRES  &SYSDATE &SYSTIME'             GLA-XA
         BAL   R14,552(,R6)                PERFORM
         NOPR  R0
         LR    R12,R15
         L     R1,16                       CVT ADDRESS
CVTDCB   EQU   X'74'               CVT OPERATING SYSTEM TYPE     GLA-XA
         TM    CVTDCB(R1),X'93'    IS THIS XA                    GLA-XA
         BO    NEWXA               YES                           GLA-XA
         L     R2,40(R1)
         LA    R3,2
         L     R15,1068(,R11)
A000038  LH    R1,0(R2)
         LTR   R1,R1
         BZ    A000060
         NOPR  R0
         CL    R1,1552(,R11)
         BE    A000070
         NR    R1,R15
         NOPR  R0
         TM    18(R1),X'20'                IS THIS DASD UCB
         BZ    A000060
         TM    3(R1),X'02'                 IS THIS IPL VOLUME
         BO    A000068
A000060  ALR   R2,R3
         B     A000038
         NOPR  R0
A000068  SLR   R15,R15
         B     744(,R6)
         NOPR  R0
A000070  LA    R7,92
         BAL   R14,1168(,R6)               PERFORM
         LA    R15,4
         B     744(,R6)
*****************************************************************GLA-XA
*                                                                GLA-XA
*        XA CODE TO FIND UCB ADDRESS                             GLA-XA
*                                                                GLA-XA
*****************************************************************GLA-XA
NEWXA    DS    0H                                                GLA-XA
         GETMAIN R,LV=116          GET WORK AREA                 GLA-XA
         LR    R5,R1               SAVE ITS ADDRESS              GLA-XA
         L     R4,16               ADDRESS OF CVT                GLA-XA
CVTUCBSC EQU   X'434'              IOSLOOKUP RTN (XA-ONLY)       GLA-XA
         L     R4,CVTUCBSC(R4)     LOOKUP ROUTINE ADDRESS        GLA-XA
         XC    0(116,R5),0(R5)     CLEAR WORK AREA               GLA-XA
         ST    R5,100(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         LA    R1,=X'20'           SPECIFY ONLY DASD             GLA-XA
         ST    R1,104(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         LA    R1,112(R5)          WORD TO PUT ADDRESS OF UCB    GLA-XA
         ST    R1,108(R5)                                        GLA-XA
         OI    108(R5),X'80'       31 BIT PARM END SET           GLA-XA
UCBLOOP1 LA    R1,100(R5)          POINT AT PARM LIST            GLA-XA
         LR    R15,R4              GET MODULE ADDRESS            GLA-XA
         BALR  R14,R15             CALL MVS                      GLA-XA
         LTR   R15,R15             ANY ERROR                     GLA-XA
         BNZ   UCBNFND             IF ANY THEN NO IPL VOLUME ??? GLA-XA
         L     R1,112(R5)          GET ADDR OF UCB               GLA-XA
         TM    3(R1),X'02'         IPL VOLUME                    GLA-XA
         BZ    UCBLOOP1            NO SO SKIP TO NEXT            GLA-XA
UCBFND   LR    R2,R1               SAVEADDRESS                   GLA-XA
         FREEMAIN R,LV=116,A=(5)   FREE SPACE                    GLA-XA
         LR    R1,R2               RESTORE ADDRESS               GLA-XA
         B     A000068             GO AND EXIT NORMALLY          GLA-XA
UCBNFND  FREEMAIN R,LV=116,A=(5)   FREE SPACE                    GLA-XA
         B     A000070             IF ANY THEN NO IPL VOLUME ??? GLA-XA
R0       EQU   0                                                 GLA-XA
R1       EQU   1                                                 GLA-XA
R2       EQU   2                                                 GLA-XA
R3       EQU   3                                                 GLA-XA
R4       EQU   4                                                 GLA-XA
R5       EQU   5                                                 GLA-XA
R6       EQU   6                                                 GLA-XA
R7       EQU   7                                                 GLA-XA
R8       EQU   8                                                 GLA-XA
R9       EQU   9                                                 GLA-XA
R10      EQU   10                                                GLA-XA
R11      EQU   11                                                GLA-XA
R12      EQU   12                                                GLA-XA
R13      EQU   13                                                GLA-XA
R14      EQU   14                                                GLA-XA
R15      EQU   15                                                GLA-XA
         END

MAPINIT.text:
TITLE 'MAPINIT - SCAN VOLUME VTOC'
***********************************************************************
*
*  ALL COMMENTS ARE INTERPRETATIONS BY EITHER THE DISASSEMBLER
*  OR GUY ALBERTELLI.
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  FOLLOWING ZAPS HAVE BEEN INTEGRATED IN SOURCE:
*     ZAP1 -  SPACE FOR MULTIPLE VOLUMES
*     ZAP8 -  SET UCBNAME IN OUTPUT LISTING
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  FOLLOWING ENHANCEMENTS HAVE BEEN ADDED:
*   16JUN92  -USE DEVTYPE MACRO INSTEAD OF TABLE TO GET DEVICE
*             CONSTANTS.
*   17JUN92  -USE CVAFDSM MACRO TO GET FREE SPACE FOR INDEX-VTOC
*             PACKS
*            -REMOVED NOPR INSTRUCTIONS
*            -CONVERTED 'BC  N,' TO EXTENDED BRANCHES
*   18JUN92  -ADDED ELEMENT TO MAPDEV TABLE TO LIST ALTERNATE CYLS
*             SO THAT THE DEVTYPE CALCULATIONS ARE CORRECT.
*   02JUL92  -ADD DYNALLOC SO THAT DDCARDS DO NOT HAVE TO BE PRESENT
*   13JUL92  -CORRECT BRANCH IN F1 DSCB PROCESSING
*   04AUG92  -CORRECT CHAINING OF DDNS FOR CASE WHERE NO DD CARDS
*             EXIST AND ALL IS DONE VIA DYNAMIC ALLOCATION. CODE LEFT
*             DDNS BLOCK THAT WAS ALL ZEROS ON CHAIN.
*            -CHANGE FUNCTION OF MAPDEV AND ALSO CALL IT IN DYNAMIC
*             ALLOCATION TO GET DEVICE NAME OF NEWLY ALLOCATED DEVICE
*   20AUG92  -ATTEMPT TO SPEED UP DSCB ACCESS BY USING CVAF MACROS
*             TO READ IN GROUPS OF DSCBS AT ONE TIME. THE ORIGINAL CODE
*             RESULTED IN 1 DISK REVOLUTION PER DSCB.
*   07OCT92  -CORRECT PROBLEM WITH RETAINING EOD INDICATION FROM CVAF
*             ACCESS. THIS PROBLEM CAUSED MAPINIT TO OCCASIONALLY
*             LOOP FOREVER READING VTOCS.
*            -CORRECT CREATION OF F5 DSCBS WHEN USING INDEXED VTOC.
*
***********************************************************************
MAPINIT  CSECT
         ENTRY MAPER
         USING WORKAREA,R11                                     20AUG92
         USING EXTREFS,R6
         USING *,R12
MAPER    EQU   *
         B    A000020
         DC   AL1(A000020-*)
         DC   C'MAPINIT  &SYSDATE &SYSTIME'
A000020  LA    R1,2856(,R11)
         L     R15,ADATER37
         BALR  R14,R15                     STD LINKAGE
         LA    R15,2140(,R11)
         LA    R1,2856(,R11)
         MVC   117(5,R15),1(R1)
         MVC   96(11,R15),13(R1)
         MVC   112(4,R15),7(R1)
         LA    R3,2648(,R11)
         L     R1,AMAPKEY
         TM    2941(R11),X'20'
         LM    R15,R0,2648(R11)            RESTORE REGS
         BZ    A000078
         L     R2,2896(,R11)
A000060  L     R3,4(,R2)
         LTR   R3,R3
         BZ    A0000A8
         LM    R15,R0,0(R3)                RESTORE REGS
         STM   R15,R0,2648(R11)            SAVE REGS
A000078  CL    R15,0(R1)
         BNE   A000088
         CL    R0,4(R1)
         BE    A000098
A000088  CLI   0(R1),X'FF'
         BE    A0000D0
         LA    R1,16(R1)
         B     A000078
A000098  OC    2938(6,R11),8(R1)
         TM    2941(R11),X'20'
         BZ    A0000F0
A0000A8  L     R2,0(,R2)
         LTR   R2,R2
         BZ    A0000C0
         L     R1,AMAPKEY
         B     A000060
A0000C0  NI    2941(R11),X'DF'
         CLC   2938(6,R11),1504(R11)
         BNE   A0000F0
A0000D0  LA    R7,6
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM
         MVC   1862(8,R11),2648(R11)
         MVI   1852(R11),X'60'
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
         B     IMAP0088
A0000F0  LA    R15,2140(,R11)
         MVC   3(6,R15),1624(R11)
         XC    964(12,R11),964(R11)
         XC    3668(44,R11),3668(R11)
         XC    3712(44,R11),3712(R11)
         XC    3768(40,R11),3768(R11)
         XC    3808(40,R11),3808(R11)
         XC    3644(24,R11),3644(R11)
         STD   R4,2568(,R11)
         LA    R1,1552(,R11)
         ST    R1,2900(,R11)
         LA    R1,956(,R11)
         ST    R1,956(,R11)
         L     R5,608(,R11)
         XC    0(176,R5),0(R5)
         CLI   2752(R11),C' '
         BE    A000190
         MVC   0(44,R5),2752(R11)
         TM    2942(R11),X'80'
         BO    A000170
         CLI   1096(R11),C' '
         BNE   A000190
         TM    2938(R11),X'04'
         BO    A0009A8
A000170  LA    R1,808(,R11)
         SVC   26                          LOCATE, ETC
         LTR   R15,R15
         BNZ   A000B40
         L     R3,820(,R11)
         MVC   1096(6,R11),6(R3)
         MVC   2752(44,R11),0(R5)
A000190  TM    2938(R11),X'04'
         BO    A0009A8
*
*   LOOP THROUGH DDNAME BLOCKS AND LOCATE REQUESTED VOLSER
*
A000198  L     R2,2888(,R11)            GET HEAD OF DDNS
         LTR   R2,R2                    ANY THERE?              04AUG92
         BZ    A0001A1                  NOPE, USE DYNAMIC ALLOC 04AUG92
A0001A0  CLC   16(6,R2),1096(R11)       LOCATE VOL IN CHAIN OF DDNS
         BE    A0001C0                  FOUND
         L     R2,0(,R2)                GO TO NEXT DDN BLOCK
         LTR   R2,R2
         BNZ   A0001A0
A0001A1  DS    0H                                               04AUG92
*                                                               02JUL92
**       SINCE THE REQUESTED VOLSER WAS NOT PRESENT IN THE      02JUL92
**       KNOWN DD CARDS, ALLOCATE A NEW DDCARD AND CREATE       02JUL92
**       THE APPROPRIATE BLOCK.                                 02JUL92
*                                                               02JUL92
         GETMAIN R,LV=WRKLEN,SP=1                               02JUL92
         LR    R7,R1                                            02JUL92
         USING WRK,R7                                           02JUL92
         XC    WRK(WRKLEN),WRK  CLEAR NEW AREA                  02JUL92
         MVC   TXT1(TXTLEN),RTXT1 SET REAL TEXT UNIT DATA       02JUL92
         MVC   TXT1+6(6),1096(R11)   SET REAL VOLSER            02JUL92
         LA    R1,DYRB          SETUP                           02JUL92
         ST    R1,PLIST           PLIST POINTER                 02JUL92
         OI    PLIST,X'80'      SET END OF LIST INDICATOR       02JUL92
         LA    R1,TXT1          SETUP                           02JUL92
         ST    R1,TXTUP            TEXT                         02JUL92
         LA    R1,TXT2                UNIT                      02JUL92
         ST    R1,TXTUP+4                POINTER                02JUL92
         LA    R1,TXT3                      LIST                02JUL92
         ST    R1,TXTUP+8                                       02JUL92
         LA    R1,TXT4                                          02JUL92
         ST    R1,TXTUP+12                                      02JUL92
         OI    TXTUP+12,X'80'   SET END OF LIST INDICATOR       02JUL92
         LA    R15,DYRB                                         02JUL92
         USING S99RB,R15                                        02JUL92
         LA    R1,TXTUP                                         02JUL92
         ST    R1,S99TXTPP                                      02JUL92
         MVI   S99VERB,S99VRBAL SET TO DSN ALLOCATION           02JUL92
         MVI   S99FLAG1,S99NOMNT  MARK NOT TO MOUNT             02JUL92
         MVI   S99RBLN,20         SET LENGTH OF BLK             02JUL92
         DROP  R15                                              02JUL92
         LA    R1,PLIST                                         02JUL92
         DYNALLOC ,                                             02JUL92
         LTR   R15,R15          ANY ERROR                       02JUL92
         BNZ   A000B98          ISSUE ERROR MESSAGE             02JUL92
         MVC   DDNBLK+8(8),TXT4+6   MOVE IN DDNAME              02JUL92
*LOOKUP DDN IN TIOT                                             02JUL92
         L     R15,16               GET CVT ADDRESS             02JUL92
         L     R15,0(,R15)          GET TCBWORDS ADDRESS        02JUL92
         L     R15,0(,R15)          GET MY TCB ADDRESS          02JUL92
         L     R15,12(,R15)         GET TIOT ADDRESS            02JUL92
         LA    R15,24(,R15)         GET DEVICE ENTRY PORTION    02JUL92
A1       SR    R0,R0                                            02JUL92
         IC    R0,0(,R15)           GET LENGTH OF ENTRY         02JUL92
         LTR   R0,R0                END OF TIOT???              02JUL92
         BZ    A3                                               02JUL92
         CLI   4(R15),C' '          DDNAME BLANK                02JUL92
         BE    A2                                               02JUL92
         CLC   4(8,R15),DDNBLK+8    MATCH DDNAME                02JUL92
         BE    A4                                               02JUL92
A2       AR    R15,R0               BUMP TO NEXT TIOT           02JUL92
         B     A1                                               02JUL92
A3       DS    0H                   ALLOCATED BUT NOT FOUND     02JUL92
         B     A000B98                                          02JUL92
*FILL IN BLOCK                                                  02JUL92
A4       DS    0H                                               02JUL92
         L     R2,16(,R15)          GET UCB ADDRESS             02JUL92
         N     R2,=A(X'00FFFFFF')   CLEAN TO 3 BYTES            02JUL92
         ST    R2,DDNBLK+4          SAVE UCB ADDRESS            02JUL92
         MVC   DDNBLK+16(6),28(R2)  SET VOLSER                  02JUL92
         MVC   DDNBLK+24(4),16(R2)  SET DEVICE TYPE             02JUL92
*                                                               04AUG92
**       CALL MAPDEV TO GET DEVICE NAME                         04AUG92
*                                                               04AUG92
         L     R1,DDNBLK+24         GET DEVICE TYPE VALUD       04AUG92
         L     R15,AMAPDEV          GET ADDRESS                 04AUG92
         BALR  R14,R15              GO TO IT                    04AUG92
         USING MAPDEVD,R1           SETUP ADDRESSABILITY        04AUG92
         MVC   DDNBLK+32(15),MDDEVNAM MOVE IN DEVICE NAME       04AUG92
         DROP  R1                                               04AUG92
         MVI   DDNBLK+32+15,C' '    AND LAST BLANK              04AUG92
*                                                               02JUL92
**       CHAIN TO DDNS BLOCKS (2888(,R11))                      02JUL92
*                                                               02JUL92
         MVC   DDNBLK(4),2888(R11)  GET OLD CHAIN ADDRESS       02JUL92
         ST    R7,2888(,R11)        SAVE NEW BLOCK ADDRESS      02JUL92
         DROP  R7                                               02JUL92
         LR    R2,R7                PREPARE TO REJOIN CODE      02JUL92
*
*   DDNAME BLOCK FOUND, SET DDNAME AND PROCESS
*
A0001C0  LA    R7,380(,R11)             -|  SET DDNAME
         LD    R0,8(,R2)                 |      EVERYWHERE
         STD   R0,40(,R7)                |          NEEDED
         LA    R7,136(,R11)              |
         STD   R0,40(,R7)                |
         LA    R7,556(,R11)              |
         STD   R0,40(,R7)                |
         LA    R7,468(,R11)              |
         STD   R0,40(,R7)               -|
         L     R14,4(,R2)               GET UCB ADDRESS
         ST    R14,1136(,R11)           SAVE ADDRESS
         L     R14,24(,R2)              GET UCBTYP WORD
         ST    R14,1092(,R11)           SAVE IT
         STC   R14,2957(,R11)           SAVE JUST DEVICE CODE
         LD    R0,32(,R2)               GET DEVICE NAME (FROM CATDEV)
         STD   R0,3592(,R11)            SAVE IT FOR LATER
         CLI   1094(R11),X'20'          CHECK FOR DASD DEVICE TYPE
         BNE   A000BA0
         MVI   BFGFLAG,0                CLEAR ALL FLAGS         20AUG92
*                                                               04AUG92
**       CALL MAPDEV TO GET DEVICE CONSTANTS BLOCK              04AUG92
*                                                               04AUG92
         LR    R1,R14                    GET DEVICE CODE        04AUG92
         L     R15,AMAPDEV               GET ADDRESS            04AUG92
         BALR  R14,R15                   GO TO IT               04AUG92
         LR    R2,R1                     PUT BACK FOR LATER CODE04AUG92
         SPACE 2                                                04AUG92
A000230  ST    R2,1072(,R11)            SAVE MAPDEV ENTRY ADDRESS
***********************************************************************
*  START OF NEW CODE FOR DEVTYPE USAGE                          16JUN92
* ORIG   MVC   1076(12,R11),16(R2)      MOVE IN DATA FROM MAPDEV
         LA    R0,2284(,R11)            GET ADDRESS OF WORKAREA 16JUN92
         DEVTYPE 596(R11),((0),24),DEVTAB                       16JUN92
         LTR   R15,R15                  ANY ERROR               16JUN92
         BNZ   A000BA8                  ISSUE UNKNOWN DEVICE    16JUN92
         LH    R1,2284+4+4+2(,R11)      GET WORD 2 BYTES 2-3    16JUN92
         STH   R1,1076(,R11)            SAVE TRACKS PER CYL     16JUN92
         STH   R1,1078(,R11)                                    16JUN92
         STH   R1,1084(,R11)                                    16JUN92
         MVC   1080(4,R11),=AL2(0,1)    SET HH CONSTANTS        16JUN92
         LH    R1,2284+4+4(,R11)        GET WORD 2 BYTES 0-1    16JUN92
         SH    R1,28(,R2)               LESS ALTERNATE CYLS     18JUN92
         MH    R1,2284+4+4+2(,R11)      TIME TRK/CYL            16JUN92
         STCM  R1,B'1111',1086(R11)     SAVE MAX REL-TRACK      16JUN92
*   END  OF NEW CODE FOR DEVTYPE USAGE                          16JUN92
***********************************************************************
         ST    R7,1596(,R11)
         MVI   1596(R11),X'80'
         LA    R1,1596(,R11)
         SVC   64                          RDJFCB
         TM    2938(R11),X'E0'
         BNZ   A000260
         TM    2943(R11),X'80'
         BZ    A000268
A000260  NI    2939(R11),X'BF'
A000268  NI    2942(R11),X'EF'
         MVI   1618(R11),X'FF'
*        LA    R15,2140(R11)            *** REPLACED VIA ZAP8
         LA    R15,2140(,R11)           *** PATCH FROM X270 -|
         L     R1,1136(,R11)            GET ADDRESS OF UCB   | ZAP8
         MVC   11(3,R15),13(R1)         MOVE IN UCB NAME    -|
**            R5 -> JFCB
A000274  MVC   3(6,R15),118(R5)         MOVE IN VOLSER FROM JFCB
         MVC   1112(6,R11),118(R5)
         MVI   2284(R11),C'0'
         MVC   2285(132,R11),1624(R11)
         MVI   87(R5),X'08'             SET "SHARED DATASET"
         MVI   52(R5),X'08'             SET "DO NOT WRITE JFCB"
         TM    2939(R11),X'40'
         BO    A000A50
         TM    2943(R11),X'40'
         BO    A000988
A0002A8  MVI   0(R5),X'04'              SET VTOC
         MVC   1(43,R5),0(R5)              DATASET NAME
         LA    R15,2284(,R11)
         MVC   1446(6,R11),118(R5)
         MVC   23(37,R15),1416(R11)
         MVC   3584(6,R11),118(R5)      SAVE VOLSER FROM JFCB
         ST    R7,1596(,R11)
         MVI   1596(R11),X'80'
         LA    R1,1596(,R11)
         SVC   22                          OPEN TYPE J
         LA    R1,136(,R11)
         ST    R1,1596(,R11)
         TM    2939(R11),X'04'
         BO    A0002F8
         TM    2940(R11),X'20'
         BO    A0002F8
         MVI   1596(R11),X'80'
         B     A000300
A0002F8  MVI   1596(R11),X'83'
A000300  LA    R1,1596(,R11)
         SVC   22                          OPEN TYPE J
         TM    48(R7),X'10'
         BZ    A000BB0
         TM    2938(R11),X'C0'
         BZ    A000330
         LA    R4,32
         BAL   R14,IMAP0100                PERFORM
         B     A000BB8
         LR    R9,R3
         S     R9,1040(,R11)
A000330  MVC   3220(28,R11),888(R11)
         LA    R2,3216(,R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP05D8             PERFORM - SPC BLK 'VOL LABEL'
         TM    2937(R11),X'40'
         BO    A000378
         LA    R9,1104(,R11)
         LA    R8,1112(,R11)
         LA    R3,1136(,R11)
         LA    R1,792(,R11)
         MVI   1(R1),X'06'
         NI    2(R1),X'37'
         OI    2(R1),X'08'
         ST    R9,4(,R1)
         ST    R8,8(,R1)
         ST    R3,12(,R1)
         SVC   56                          ENQ/RESERVE
         OI    2941(R11),X'10'
*
*  HANDLE FORMAT 4 DSCB (SELF DESCRIBING RECORD)
*
A000378  L     R3,2932(,R11)
         LR    R9,R3
*        BAL   R14,IMAP0770                PERFORM - READ NEXT DSCB
*        B     A000B80                  ERROR EXIT
         BAL   R14,RDSCBNXT         READ NEXT (FIRST) DSCB      20AUG92
         LTR   R15,R15              ANY ERROR?                  20AUG92
         BNZ   A000B80              YES, ISSUE MESSAGE          20AUG92
         CLI   44(R9),C'4'              CHECK FOR FORMAT 4 DSCB
         BNE   A000BC0
         MVI   3371(R11),X'01'
         TM    2938(R11),X'04'
         BO    A000A08
         TM    2938(R11),X'02'
         BO    A000558
         TM    2943(R11),X'80'
         BO    A000558
*                                                               17JUN92
*  IS THIS "ACTIVE INDEX VTOC PACK" ??                          17JUN92
*                                                               17JUN92
         NI    BFGFLAG,255-BFIDXVT      CLEAR FLAG              20AUG92
         TM    58(R9),X'81'             ARE BOTH BITS ON        17JUN92
         BNO   B0001                    NO - SO NO REAL VTOC IDX17JUN92
         OI    BFGFLAG,BFIDXVT          FLAG ACTIVE INDEX       17JUN92
         B     A0003C8                  CONTINUE                17JUN92
B0001    DS    0H                                               17JUN92
*
*  IS "DOS" BIT ON - CONTAMINATED PACK
*
         TM    58(R9),X'80'
         BZ    A0003C8
         LA    R7,76
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM - BUILD ERROR MSG
         MVI   1852(R11),X'60'
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM - OUTPUT LINE
         OI    2942(R11),X'01'
*
*  CREATE SPACE BLOCK FOR VTOC EXTENTS
*
A0003C8  MVC   3220(8,R11),107(R9)

A000B58  NI    2939(R11),X'FB'

A000B80  LA    R7,58

A000C00  BAL   R14,IMAP08C0                PERFORM

         B     A000558
A000C10  LA    R7,10

         B     A000C00
A000C1E  LA    R7,66
         BAL   R14,IMAP0490                PERFORM

         B     A000C00
A000C2C  LA    R7,12
         BAL   R14,IMAP0490                PERFORM
         LR    R2,R9
A000C38  BAL   R14,IMAP08C0                PERFORM

         BAL   R14,IMAP08C0                PERFORM

         BAL   R14,IMAP0490                PERFORM

A000C60  LA    R7,62

MAPINITA.text:
*                                                               20AUG92
**  Read a specific DSCB                                        20AUG92
**                                                              20AUG92
**     Now using CVAF macros to access the VTOC DSCBs           20AUG92
**                                                              20AUG92
**       Input                                                  20AUG92
**             R2  -  ptr to 5 byte seek address (CCHHR)        20AUG92
**             R3  -  ptr to 148 byte buffer                    20AUG92
**                    +0   -  44 byte DSN (DSCB key)            20AUG92
**                    +44  -  96 byte DSCB                      20AUG92
**                    +140 -  8 byte MBBCCHHR of DSCB           20AUG92
**             R14 -  return address                            20AUG92
**       Output                                                 20AUG92
**             R15 -  0  DSCB moved to buffer                   20AUG92
**                    4  EOF occured                            20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
RDSCBDIR DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)      Save registers              20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP0228         Get new save area           20AUG92
         LA    R4,CV@BUFF           point to buffer             20AUG92
         USING BFLHDR,R4                                        20AUG92
         MVI   BFLHNOE,1            set number of entries       20AUG92
         OI    BFLHFL,BFLHDSCB      indicate this is DSCB       20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLHLN(,R4)       point at first element      20AUG92
         USING BFLE,R4                                          20AUG92
         MVC   BFLEARG(5),0(R2)     set CCHHR                   20AUG92
         MVI   BFLEFL,BFLECHR       incideat arg is CCHHR       20AUG92
         MVI   BFLELTH,140          show big DSCB               20AUG92
         ST    R3,BFLEBUF                                       20AUG92
         DROP  R4                                               20AUG92
         LA    R4,CV@BUFF           point at buffer list        20AUG92
         L     R7,1136(,R11)        get UCB address             20AUG92
         CVAFDIR ACCESS=READ,                                   20AUG92X
               BUFLIST=(R4),                                    20AUG92X
               UCB=(R7),                                        20AUG92X
               DSN=(R11),                                       20AUG92X
               IOAREA=KEEP,                                     20AUG92X
               BRANCH=(YES,PGM),                                20AUG92X
               MF=(E,CV@CVPL)                                   20AUG92
         LTR   R15,R15              any error?                  20AUG92
         BNZ   CV$ERR               yes error                   20AUG92
         MVC   140(3,R3),=XL3'00'   set MBB                     20AUG92
         MVC   143(5,R3),BFLEARG-BFLE+BFLHLN(R4)  set CCHHR     20AUG92
         B     IMAP02C8             all done                    20AUG92
         EJECT                                                  20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**  Read next DSCB                                              20AUG92
**                                                              20AUG92
**     Now using CVAF macros to access the VTOC DSCBs           20AUG92
**                                                              20AUG92
**       Input                                                  20AUG92
**             R3  -  ptr to 148 byte buffer                    20AUG92
**                    +0   -  44 byte DSN (DSCB key)            20AUG92
**                    +44  -  96 byte DSCB                      20AUG92
**                    +140 -  8 byte MBBCCHHR of DSCB           20AUG92
**             R14 -  return address                            20AUG92
**       Output                                                 20AUG92
**             R15 -  0  DSCB moved to buffer                   20AUG92
**                    4  EOF occured                            20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
RDSCBNXT DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)      Save registers              20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP0228         Get new save area           20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Is this the first time                                 20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
         TM    BFGFLAG,CVF@1ST      Has first pass occured      20AUG92
         BZ    CV$G1ST              No, so do initialization    20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Any left in current list                               20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
         L     R4,CV@NEXT           Point at next entry         20AUG92
         OC    BFLEARG-BFLE(5,R4),BFLEARG-BFLE(R4) Present??    20AUG92
         BNZ   CV$BFDO              Yes, so go and move it      20AUG92
         B     CV$GMORE             if not then get next load   20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       First time through, build buffer list for 100 DSCBs    20AUG92
**       The 101st buffer entry is to stop the processing       20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV$G1ST  OI    BFGFLAG,CVF@1ST      flag that first occured     20AUG92
         MVC   CV@CVPL(CV$CVPLL),CV$CVPL  init parm list        20AUG92
         L     R0,=A(100*140)       get size of buffer area     20AUG92
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                       20AUG92
         ST    R1,CV@BFAR           save address of buffer area 20AUG92
         LR    R7,R1                setup addressability        20AUG92
         L     R0,=A(BFLHLN+101*BFLELN) get size of storage     20AUG92
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                       20AUG92
         ST    R1,CV@BFLST          save address of buffer list 20AUG92
         LR    R4,R1                setup addressability        20AUG92
         USING BFLHDR,R4                                        20AUG92
         LR    R0,R1                move address to correct reg 20AUG92
         L     R1,=A(BFLHLN+101*BFLELN) get length              20AUG92
         SR    R14,R14                                          20AUG92
         SR    R15,R15                                          20AUG92
         MVCL  R0,R14               clear out area              20AUG92
         MVI   BFLHNOE,100          set number of entries       20AUG92
         OI    BFLHFL,BFLHDSCB      indicate this is DSCB       20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLHLN(,R4)       point to first entry        20AUG92
         USING BFLE,R4                                          20AUG92
         LA    R5,100               set count to do             20AUG92
CV$BFLP  DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         OI    BFLEFL,BFLECHR       indicate for cchhr          20AUG92
         MVI   BFLELTH,140          set length of buffer        20AUG92
         ST    R7,BFLEBUF           point at buffer             20AUG92
         LA    R7,140(,R7)                                      20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLELN(,R4)       point to next entry         20AUG92
         BCT   R5,CV$BFLP           loop till done              20AUG92
         DROP  R4                                               20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Issue the CVAF macro to get the data                   20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
         L     R4,CV@BFLST          point at buffer list        20AUG92
         L     R7,1136(,R11)        get UCB address             20AUG92
         CVAFSEQ ACCESS=GTEQ,                                   20AUG92X
               BUFLIST=(R4),                                    20AUG92X
               UCB=(R7),                                        20AUG92X
               IOAREA=KEEP,                                     20AUG92X
               BRANCH=(YES,PGM),                                20AUG92X
               MF=(E,CV@CVPL)                                   20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLHLN(,R4)       point at first element      20AUG92
         ST    R4,CV@NEXT           save address of next elemnet20AUG92
         ST    R15,CV@CVRC          save return code for next timeAUG92
         CH    R15,=H'4'            see if real error           20AUG92
         BL    CV$BFDO              nope, just process          20AUG92
         BH    CV$ERR               go and process error        20AUG92
         CLI   CV@CVPL+CVSTAT-CVPL,X'20' did eof occur??        20AUG92
         BNE   CV$ERR               no, so process real error   20AUG92
         OI    BFGFLAG,CVFEOD       remember eod occured        07OCT92
         OC    BFLEARG-BFLE(5,R4),BFLEARG-BFLE(R4)              20AUG92
         BZ    CV$EOD               eod occured                 20AUG92
         B     CV$BFDO              go and give entry           20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Have completed passing items in the list,              20AUG92
**       now see if there is any more data to read              20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV$GMORE DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         TM    BFGFLAG,CVFEOD       did eod occur??             07OCT92
         BO    CV$EOD               yes - process it            07OCT92
CV$GM1   L     R4,CV@BFLST          point at buffer list        20AUG92
ZZZ      EQU   BFLEARG-BFLE+BFLHLN+99*BFLELN                    20AUG92
         MVC   BFLEARG-BFLE+BFLHLN(5,R4),ZZZ(R4) set last CCHHR 20AUG92
         L     R7,1136(,R11)        get UCB address             20AUG92
         CVAFSEQ ACCESS=GT,                                     20AUG92X
               BUFLIST=(R4),                                    20AUG92X
               UCB=(R7),                                        20AUG92X
               DSN=0,                                           20AUG92X
               IOAREA=KEEP,                                     20AUG92X
               BRANCH=(YES,PGM),                                20AUG92X
               MF=(E,CV@CVPL)                                   20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLHLN(,R4)       point at first element      20AUG92
         ST    R4,CV@NEXT           save address of next elemnet20AUG92
         ST    R15,CV@CVRC          save return code for next timeAUG92
         CH    R15,=H'4'            see if real error           20AUG92
         BL    CV$BFDO              nope, just process          20AUG92
         BH    CV$ERR               go and process error        20AUG92
         CLI   CV@CVPL+CVSTAT-CVPL,X'20' did eof occur??        20AUG92
         BNE   CV$ERR               no, so process real error   20AUG92
         OI    BFGFLAG,CVFEOD       remember eod occured        07OCT92
         OC    BFLEARG-BFLE(5,R4),BFLEARG-BFLE(R4)              20AUG92
         BZ    CV$EOD               eod occured on first DSCB   20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       R4 points to entry to move                             20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV$BFDO  DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         USING BFLE,R4                                          20AUG92
         L     R5,BFLEBUF           point to buffer             20AUG92
         MVC   0(140,R3),0(R5)      move in DSCB                20AUG92
         MVC   140(3,R3),=XL3'00'   set MBB                     20AUG92
         MVC   143(5,R3),BFLEARG    set CCHHR                   20AUG92
         LA    R4,BFLELN(,R4)       point to next buffer element20AUG92
         ST    R4,CV@NEXT           save it                     20AUG92
         SR    R15,R15              set good return code        20AUG92
         B     IMAP02E8             Now just return             20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       EOD detected from CVAF, return to proper place         20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV$EOD   DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         L     R0,=A(100*140)       get size of buffer area     20AUG92
         L     R1,CV@BFAR           get address of buffer area  20AUG92
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                20AUG92
         L     R0,=A(BFLHLN+101*BFLELN) get size of storage     20AUG92
         L     R1,CV@BFLST          get address of buffer list  20AUG92
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                20AUG92
         NI    BFGFLAG,255-CVF@1ST-CVFEOD  reset flags          07OCT92
         LA    R15,4                set EOD return code         20AUG92
         B     IMAP02E8                                         20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Error occured, R15 has return code CVSTAT has status   20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV$ERR   DS    0H                                               20AUG92
         LR    R2,R15               save return code            20AUG92
         LA    R7,75*2              set message number (72)     20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0         format message              20AUG92
         LR    R0,R2                set value to convert        20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728         convert to decimal          20AUG92
         MVC   1853+28(2,R11),2618(R11)  move in 2 digits       20AUG92
         LA    R2,CV@CVPL+CVSTAT-CVPL point to status field     20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP09A8         convert to hex              20AUG92
         MVC   1853+37(2,R11),2632(R11)  move in data           20AUG92
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328         output message              20AUG92
         DC    H'0'                 **NO IDEA HOW TO ABORT**    20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Constants                                              20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
         LTORG                                                  20AUG92
CV$CVPL  CVAFSEQ ACCESS=GT,                                     20AUG92X
               BUFLIST=1,                                       20AUG92X
               UCB=(XX),                                        20AUG92X
               IOAREA=KEEP,                                     20AUG92X
               BRANCH=(YES,PGM),                                20AUG92X
               MF=(L)                                           20AUG92
CV$CVPLL EQU   *-CV$CVPL                                        20AUG92

MAPSPACE.text:
TITLE 'MAPSPACE - ANALYZE SPACE OCCUPIED BY DSCBS'
***********************************************************************
*
*  ALL COMMENTS ARE INTERPRETATIONS BY EITHER THE DISASSEMBLER
*  OR GUY ALBERTELLI.
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  PURPOSE:
*       ANALYZE AND VALIDATE THE DIFFERENT DSCB'S
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  FOLLOWING ENHANCEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE TO THE SOURCE:
*
*     18MAY92  CORRECT HANDLING OF VSAM DATASETS W/ MORE THAN 16 XTNTS
*     06OCT92  CORRECT HANDLING OF RELATIVE TRACK AMOUNTS WITH
*              HALFWORD INSTRUCTIONS
*
***********************************************************************
MAPSPACE CSECT
         ENTRY F13CNVT
         ENTRY F5SPANAL
         ENTRY F6SPANAL
         ENTRY F1SPANAL
         ENTRY SPACECOM
         ENTRY ANLPATCH
         ENTRY ANLSCON
         USING EXTREFS,R6
         USING *,R12
SPACECOM EQU   *
A000000  SAVE  (14,12),,'MAPSPACE &SYSDATE &SYSTIME'            18MAY92
*    A000000  B     X'1C'(,R15)
*             DC    X'17'
*             DC    C'MAPSPACE'
*             DC    C' 10'
*             DC    X'61'
*             DC    C'15'
*             DC    X'61'
*             DC    C'75 14'
*             DC    X'4B'
*             DC    C'58'
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)             SAVE REGS
         BAL   R14,IMAP0228                PERFORM
         LR    R12,R15
         LR    R15,R0
         B     A000030(15)
A000030  B     A000040                  F1SPANAL
         B     A000388                  F13CNVT
         B     A000418                  F6SPANAL
         B     A000470                  F5SPANAL
*
**  F1SPANAL
**       ANALYZE THE SPACE TAKEN UP BY A FORMAT 1 DSCB.
**          (AND ITS ASSOCIATED FORMAT 3 DSCBS.)
**
**  INPUT
**     R9  -  FORMAT 1 DSCB BLOCK
**     R10 -  FIRST FORMAT 3 DSCB BLOCK IF ANY, ELSE 0
*
A000040  TM    2941(R11),X'02'
         BO    A000140
         STE   R4,3028(,R11)
         SLR   R5,R5
         IC    R5,59(,R9)
         LTR   R5,R5
         BZ    A000140
         LTR   R10,R10                  ANY F3 DSCBS??
*************************************************************** 18MAY92
*  START OF CODE TO FIX MULTIPLE F3 BLOCKS - VSAM EXTENT PROB   18MAY92
*        BNZ   A000070                  YES - SKIP CHECK        18MAY92
         USING WORKAREA,R11                                     18MAY92
         BZ    B0001                    NO - CONTINUE W/ ORIG   18MAY92
         XC    BFGXTNT,BFGXTNT          CLEAR FIELD             18MAY92
         CH    R5,=AL2(13+3)            MORE THAN F1+F3         18MAY92
         BNH   A000070                  NO - SO OK              18MAY92
         SH    R5,=AL2(13+3)            GET REMAINING COUNT     18MAY92
         STH   R5,BFGXTNT               SAVE IT                 18MAY92
         LA    R5,13+3                  NUMBER TO DO            18MAY92
         B     A000070                  GO DO IT                18MAY92
B0001    DS    0H                                               18MAY92
         DROP  R11                                              18MAY92
*    END OF CODE TO FIX MULTIPLE F3 BLOCKS - VSAM EXTENT PROB   18MAY92
*************************************************************** 18MAY92
         CLI   59(R9),X'03'             BAD EXTENT COUNT FOR F1 DSCB
         BNH   A000070                  NO - OK
         LA    R5,3                     SET TO MAXIMUM FOR F1 DSCB
A000070  SLR   R3,R3                    CLEAR OFFSET REGISTER
         SLR   R4,R4                    CLEAR TOTAL TRACK SUM
A000078  EX    R0,A000348(3)            POINT AT THIS EXTENT
         L     R15,AF13CNVT             GET ADDRESS OF CONVERTER
         BALR  R14,R15                  CONVERT TO SPACE BLK FORMAT
         ALR   R4,R0                    INCREMENT TRACKS TOTAL
         TM    2938(R11),X'08'
         BZ    A000118
         MVC   3220(8,R11),2(R2)        SAVE START/END CCHH IN SP BLK
         ST    R0,3228(,R11)            SAVE TOTAL TRACKS
         IC    R14,1(R2)
         STC   R14,3235(,R11)           SAVE EXTENT NUMBER
         LD    R0,3248(,R11)
         STD   R0,3240(,R11)            SAVE START/END R-TRK
         LA    R0,0(,R9)
         ST    R0,3236(,R11)            POINT AT DSN
         TM    2940(R11),X'80'
         BZ    A0000C0
         OI    3236(R11),X'80'
A0000C0  LA    R2,3216(,R11)
         TM    2938(R11),X'C0'
         BZ    A000110
         TM    2939(R11),X'80'
         BZ    A000108
         ST    R9,3640(,R11)
         STM   R2,R4,3628(R11)             SAVE REGS
         LA    R4,32
         BAL   R14,IMAP0100                PERFORM
         B     A000140
         LR    R9,R3
         S     R9,1040(,R11)
         LM    R2,R4,3628(R11)             RESTORE REGS
         BAL   R14,IMAP05D8                PERFORM
         LA    R3,4(R3)
         L     R9,3640(,R11)
         BCT   R5,A000078
         B     A000120
A000108  OI    2939(R11),X'80'
A000110  BAL   R14,IMAP05D8                PERFORM - ADD SP BLK TO CHN
A000118  LA    R3,4(R3)                 INCR OFFSET TO INSTR
         BCT   R5,A000078               SEE IF ANY MORE EXTNTS
*
*   OUT OF EXTENTS IN THIS PAIR OF F1 AND F3 DSCBS,
*      CHECK FOR MORE
*
A000120  ST    R4,3028(,R11)            SAVE SIZE OF DATASET
         LTR   R10,R10                  WAS THERE A F3 DSCB
         BZ    A000140                  NO - SO ALL DONE
         CLC   135(5,R10),1504(R11)     IS F3 CHAIN FIELD ZERO
         BE    A000140                  YES - ALL DONE
         L     R10,148(,R10)            POINT TO NEXT F3 DSCB
         LA    R3,12                    RESET OFFSET TO START OF F3
*************************************************************** 18MAY92
*  START OF CODE TO FIX MULTIPLE F3 BLOCKS - VSAM EXTENT PROB   18MAY92
         USING WORKAREA,R11                                     18MAY92
         LA    R5,13                    NUMBER OF XTNT IN F3    18MAY92
         LH    R0,BFGXTNT               GET NUMBER LEFT         18MAY92
         SR    R0,R5                    LESS THIS SLUG          18MAY92
         BM    B0002                    SKIP IF NEG             18MAY92
         STH   R0,BFGXTNT               NEXT AMNT TO DO         18MAY92
         B     A000078                  DO AGAIN                18MAY92
B0002    LH    R5,BFGXTNT               GET REMAINING COUNT     18MAY92
         DROP  R11                                              18MAY92
*    END OF CODE TO FIX MULTIPLE F3 BLOCKS - VSAM EXTENT PROB   18MAY92
*************************************************************** 18MAY92
         B     A000078                  DO AGAIN
*
*  COLLECT STATISTICS ON THIS DATASET
*
A000140  NI    2939(R11),X'7F'
         NI    2940(R11),X'7F'
         LA    R0,1
         CLI   59(R9),X'00'
         BE    A000228
         CLI   59(R9),X'01'

MAPTRACK.text:
TITLE 'MAPTRACK - FORMAT TRACK ORDER REPORT'
***********************************************************************
*
*  ALL COMMENTS ARE INTERPRETATIONS BY EITHER THE DISASSEMBLER
*  OR GUY ALBERTELLI.
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  PURPOSE:
*       FORMAT A REPORT IN TRACK ORDER.
*
***********************************************************************
*
* THE FOLLOWING ENHANCEMENTS HAVE BEEN ADDED
*   20AUG92  -CHANGE SIZE OF MAXIMUM RELATIVE TRACK FIELD TO 4
*             BYTES TO SUPPORT 3380K AND 3390
*            -REMOVED NOPR INSTRUCTIONS
*            -CONVERTED 'BC  N,' TO EXTENDED BRANCHES
*
***********************************************************************
MAPTRACK CSECT
         ENTRY TRKPATCH
         ENTRY TRKSCON
         USING EXTREFS,R6
         USING *,R12
A000000  B     A00001C-A000000(,R15)
         DC    X'17'
         DC    C'MAPTRACK &SYSDATE &SYSTIME'
A00001C  STM   R14,R12,12(R13)             SAVE REGS
         BAL   R14,IMAP0228                PERFORM
         LR    R12,R15
         MVI   1618(R11),X'FF'
         TM    2943(R11),X'01'
         BO    A000040
         LA    R7,24
         ST    R7,1620(,R11)
         OI    1620(R11),X'80'
A000040  LA    R15,2284(,R11)
         MVC   23(80,R15),1624(R11)
         MVC   1486(6,R11),1112(R11)
         MVC   23(40,R15),1453(R11)
         SLR   R5,R5
         L     R9,956(,R11)
         L     R4,1552(,R11)
A000060  BAL   R15,IMAP0560                PERFORM - MOVE MESSAGE W/CC
         CLC   4(4,R9),960(R11)
         BE    A0002B8
         L     R0,28(,R9)               GET END REL-TRK OF ITEM
         CLM   R0,B'1111',1086(R11)     CHECK AGAINST MAX REL-TRK
         BNL   A0000E8                  GO GIVE ERROR
         L     R0,24(,R9)               GET START REL-TRK OR ITEM
         CL    R0,28(,R9)               CHECK AGAINST END REL-TRK
         BH    A0000E8                  IF BIGGER THEN ERROR
         SR    R0,R4                    GET DIFF OF PREV END, THIS STRT
         S     R0,976(,R11)             LESS 1 ???
         BZ    A0000B0                  =0 THEN ALL OK
         BP    A0000F8                  >0 THEN MISSING TRKS
         TM    20(R9),X'80'
         BO    A0000A8
         MVC   1866(7,R11),A0003DE      FLAG "OVERLAP"
A0000A8  C     R4,28(,R9)               CHECK OLD END, THIS END
         BNL   A0000B8                  SKIP NEXT, OLD END BIGGER
A0000B0  L     R4,28(,R9)               GET NEW ITEM END
A0000B8  L     R0,12(,R9)               GET NUMBER OF TRKS
         ALR   R5,R0
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM - CVT TRKS TO DEC
         MVC   1902(5,R11),2583(R11)
         TM    2940(R11),X'04'
         BZ    A000210
         CLC   1866(7,R11),A0003DE      WAS THIS AN OVERLAP
         BE    A000210                  YES - DO FORMAT
         B     A0002B0                  NO - CONTINUE WITH NEXT
A0000E8  MVC   1859(14,R11),A0003C0     FLAG "INVALID EXTENT"
         B     A000210                  AND FORMAT REST
*
*  HANDLE "MISSING TRACKS" CASE
*    R0 HAS COUNT OF MISSING TRACKS
*
A0000F8  TM    2940(R11),X'04'
         BO    A0000B0
         LR    R15,R0
         ST    R0,3032(,R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM - CVT MISSING TO DEC
         MVC   1859(14,R11),A0003CE    FLAG "MISSING TRACKS"
         MVC   1853(5,R11),2583(R11)
         LA    R4,1(R4)
         ST    R4,3000(,R11)
         STH   R4,2958(,R11)
         LA    R2,3000(,R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP09A8                PERFORM
         MVC   1878(4,R11),2636(R11)
         LH    R14,1084(,R11)
         CR    R15,R14
         BL    A000178
         SLR   R14,R14
         LR    R15,R4
         LH    R7,1084(,R11)
         DR    R14,R7
         LTR   R14,R14
         BNZ   A000158
         ST    R14,3004(,R11)
         B     A000164
A000158  SR    R7,R14
         SR    R0,R7
         ST    R7,3004(,R11)
         LH    R7,1084(,R11)
A000164  SLR   R14,R14
         LR    R15,R0
         DR    R14,R7
         A     R14,3004(,R11)
         LR    R1,R14
         B     A000180
A000178  LR    R1,R15
         SLR   R15,R15
A000180  ST    R15,3000(,R11)

A0001C8  LA    R2,3000(,R11)

*
*  FORMAT REGULAR DATASET
*

         MVC   1880(4,R11),2632(R11)
         MVC   1885(4,R11),2636(R11)

         MVC   1896(4,R11),2636(R11)
         MVI   1895(R11),X'4B'

         BO    A000260

         AL    R0,16(,R9)              GET EXTENT NUMBER
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM - CONVERT TO DECIMAL
         MVC   1909(2,R11),2586(R11)
A000260  L     R1,20(,R9)
         MVC   1914(44,R11),0(R1)      SET DATASET NAME
         TM    2938(R11),X'20'
         BO    A0002A0
         TM    2938(R11),X'80'
         BZ    A000290
         CLI   1914(R11),C' '
         BNE   A0002B0
         B     A0002A0
A000290  CLI   1884(R11),X'4B'
         BNE   A0002A0
         TM    2938(R11),X'40'
         BO    A0002B0
A0002A0  TM    2943(R11),X'01'
         BO    A0002B0
         MVI   1852(R11),C' '
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
A0002B0  L     R9,0(,R9)                GO TO NEXT ITEM
         B     A000060
*
*  START OF CLEANUP AND EXIT ROUTINE
*
A0002B8  ICM   R0,B'1111',1086(R11)
         SLR   R0,R5
         S     R0,976(,R11)
         BNP   A000318
         ST    R0,3008(,R11)

         BZ    A0002F0

         OI    2939(R11),X'10'
         B     A0000F8
A0002E8  NI    2939(R11),X'EF'
A0002F0  L     R0,3008(,R11)
         LA    R7,14
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM
         AL    R0,976(,R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM
         MVC   1861(5,R11),2583(R11)
         MVI   1852(R11),C'0'
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
A000318  TM    2939(R11),X'04'
         BZ    A000370
         L     R15,AREWRITE
         BALR  R14,R15                     STD LINKAGE
         BAL   R14,IMAP0A88                PERFORM
         BAL   R14,IMAP0A48                PERFORM
         LA    R7,72
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM
         L     R0,3036(,R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM
         MVC   1861(5,R11),2583(R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
         L     R0,3040(,R11)
         LTR   R0,R0
         BZ    A000370
         LA    R7,74
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM
         MVC   1861(5,R11),2583(R11)
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
A000370  LR    R0,R5
         LA    R7,16
         BAL   R14,IMAP04B0                PERFORM
         BAL   R14,IMAP0728                PERFORM
         MVC   1861(5,R11),2583(R11)
         MVI   1852(R11),C'0'
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
         TM    2938(R11),X'20'
         BO    A0003A0
         TM    2938(R11),X'C0'
         BNZ   A0003B0
A0003A0  LA    R7,12
         BAL   R14,IMAP0520                PERFORM
         BAL   R14,IMAP0328                PERFORM
         BAL   R14,IMAP0A48                PERFORM
A0003B0  LA    R15,2284(,R11)
         MVC   23(80,R15),1624(R11)

WORKAREA.text:
EJECT                                                  17MAY92
         PRINT NOGEN                                            17MAY92
DSCB     DSECT                                                  17MAY92
         IECSDSL1 (5)                                           17MAY92
         PRINT GEN                                              17MAY92
WORKAREA DSECT
***********************************************************************
*
* THIS REPRESENTS THE LOGIC GLEANED ABOUT THE R11 WORKAREA
*
* ALSO NEW INFORMATION HAS BEEN ADDED TO SUPPORT CHANGES IN MAPINIT
*
***********************************************************************
*
*  +124    4 BYTE PTR TO DSCB STORAGE BLOCK AREAS
*             +0  PTR TO PREVIOUS BLOCK
*             +4  BYTES FREE IN THIS BLOCK
*             +8  ADDR OF FIRST BYTE FREE (INITIALLY BLOCK+32)
*             +12 BLOCK SIZE
*             +16 PTR TO NEXT BLOCK
*             +20 12 BYTES UNUSED
*  +608    MANY THINGS
*          1.  IS EXLST FOR JFCB (I.E. PTR TO JFCB BLOCK)
*          2.  IS POINTER TO DSN FOR OBTAIN BLOCK AT +840
*  +820    ADDRESS OF DSCB OBTAINED VIA CAMLST AT +840
*  +840    CAMLST SEARCH BLOCK
*  +956    PTR TO FIRST SPACE BLOCK ON CHAIN
*  +1076   12 BYTE AREA FOR DEVICE CONSTANTS
*     +1076  SCALE FACTOR - TRKS/CYL          ---|
*     +1078  SCALE FACTOR - TRKS/CYL             |  SEE MAPDEV FOR
*     +1080  SCALE FACTOR - 0 OR 1               |    COMPLETE
*     +1082  SCALE FACTOR - 1                    |      DEFINITION
*     +1084  TRUE TRACKS PER CYLINDER            |
*     +1086  MAXIMUM RELATIVE TRACK NUMBER    ---|
*  **NEW**
*     +1088 (2) APPEARS TO BE FREE, WILL COMBINE WITH +1086 TO
*               MAKE 4 BYTE AREA FOR MAXIMUM TRACK NUMBER, BECAUSE
*               3380K AND 3390 ARE BIGGER THAN HALF WORD
*  +1096   6 BYTE VALUE OF VOL= PARAMETER (NOTE NOT "VOL=(")
*  +1112   6 BYTE VALUE OF VOLSER OF PACK NOW BEING PROCESSED
*              ALSO POINTED TO BY THE CAMLST MACRO AT +840
*  +1120   8 CHARACTER CONSTANT 'SYSCTLG '
*  +1140   4 BYTE ADDRESS OF SYSRES UCB
*  +1624   133 CHARACTER CONSTANT OF BLANKS
*  +1768   80 BYTE AREA FOR INPUT CARD
*  +1976   480 BYTE AREA FOR 10 UCB BLOCKS
*     A UCB BLOCK:
*        +0(4)   CHAIN FIELD
*        +4(4)   UCB ADDRESS
*        +8(8)   DDNAME
*        +16(6)  VOLSER
*        +22(2)  FLAGS
*                   X'80'  UCB SCANED FOR USERID/DEPT
*        +24(4)  UCBTYP
*        +28(4)  UNUSED ???
*        +32(16)  DEVICE NAME
*  +1992   4 BYTE HEADER FOR WTO OF NEXT FIELD     **overlaps above**
*  +1996   66 BYTE VALUE FOR "SEND" CARD VALUE     **overlaps above**
*  +2648   8 BYTE VALUE OF CURRENT OPERATION FIELD
*  +2656   44 BYTE VALUE OF CNAME= PARAMETER OR BLANKS (DSN)
*  +2752   44 BYTE VALUE OF DSNAME PARAMETER OR BLANKS (DSN)
*  +2800   44 BYTE VALUE OF DSNAME PARAMETER OR BLANKS (DSN)
*  +2888   POINTER TO VALID UCB BLOCKS
*  +2892   TEMPORARY WORK VARIABLE
*  +2900   4 BYTE PTR TO FIRST F1 200 BYTE BLOCK (DSCB) IN DSN ORDER
*  +2904   4 BYTE PTR TO FIRST FREE SAVE AREA IN CHAIN OF AREAS
*                +0  POINTS TO NEXT BLOCK
*                +4  NORMAL 72 BYTE SAVEAREA
*                    +0   FLAG  =00 FREE, =FF INUSE
*  +2932   4 BYTE PTR TO F4 152 BYTE BLOCK (DSCB)  VTOC SELF DESCRIBE
*  +2938   FLAGS1  (+B7A)
*            X'80'
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'  DO CATALOG PROCESSING
*            X'02'
*            X'01'
*  +2939   FLAGS2  (+B7B)
*            X'80'
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'
*            X'02'
*            X'01'
*  +2940   FLAGS3  (+B7C)
*            X'80'
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'  PROCESS ONLY OVERLAP CONDITION (OVERLAP CARD)
*            X'02'
*            X'01'
*  +2941   FLAGS4  (+B7D)
*            X'80'
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'
*            X'02'  MSG 32 ALREADY ISSUED - OUT OF CORE
*            X'01'
*  +2942   FLAGS5  (+B7E)
*            X'80'
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'
*            X'02'
*            X'01'  ERROR OCCURED - ISSUE MSG 40
*  +2943   FLAGS6  (+B7F)
*            X'80'  PROCESS EACH DSN
*            X'40'
*            X'20'
*            X'10'
*            X'08'
*            X'04'
*            X'02'
*            X'01'  DO NOT PRINT DETAIL DATA (DSN OR CATLG)
*  +2976   4 BYTE PTR TO FIRST F5 152 BYTE BLOCK (DSCB)
*  +2992   4 BYTE PTR TO LAST F5 152 BYTE BLOCK (DSCB)
*  +3024   OUTPUT OF IMAP0678 - CONVERT TO HEX
*  +3216   32 BYTE AREA - PROTOTYPE SPACE BLOCK
*  +3304   4 BYTE - COUNT OF FREE EXTENTS
*  +3608   4 BYTE - TAIL POINTER TO LIST OF VOL=( BLOCKS (EACH 48 BYT)
*  +3616   4 BYTE - HEAD POINTER TO LIST OF VOL=( BLOCKS (EACH 48 BYT)
*
***********************************************************************
         ORG   *+X'F08'         IEHMAPRT PATCH AREA             20AUG92
***********************************************************************
*
*  NEW ITEMS TO SUPPORT CHANGED TO MAPTRACK
*
***********************************************************************
BFGXTNT  DS    H                EXTENTS LEFT TO DO              18MAY92
***********************************************************************
*
*  NEW ITEMS TO SUPPORT CHANGED TO MAPINIT
*
***********************************************************************
KF5      EQU   26                                               17MAY92

BFIDXVT  EQU   X'80'            VTOC INDEX ACTIVE               17MAY92
CVF@1ST  EQU   X'40'                 ON - 1st pass done         20AUG92
CVFEOD   EQU   X'20'            ON - EOD OCCURED ON CVAFSEQ     07OCT92
EXTABL   DS    0CL(1+(KF5+1)*L'DS5AVEXT)                        17MAY92
EXTNO    DS    AL1                                              17MAY92
EXTS     DS    CL((KF5+1)*L'DS5AVEXT)                           17MAY92
INCVPL   CVAFDSM MF=L                                           17MAY92
*                                                               20AUG92
**       Work areas for new VTOC access method                  20AUG92
*                                                               20AUG92
CV@NEXT  DS    A                    pointer to next entry to do 20AUG92
CV@BFLST DS    A                    pointer to buffer list      20AUG92
CV@BFAR  DS    A                    pointer to buffer area      20AUG92
CV@CVRC  DS    A                    CVAF macro return code      20AUG92

               BUFLIST=1,                                       20AUG92X

               MF=(L)                                           20AUG92

MAPDEVD  DSECT                                                  04AUG92

*************************************************************** 04AUG92
MDDEVTYP DS   X                  DEVICE TYPE+3 CODE OR X'FF'    04AUG92

ZAP5.text:
*/TS15500Z JOB 527TSO000S0008,TEC,CLASS=J,MSGCLASS=1
*/ EXEC PGM=AMASPZAP
*/SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=1
*/SYSLIB DD DSN=SYS2.MLINKLIB,DISP=SHR
*/SYSIN DD *
* THE FOLLOWING MOD IS THE INFORMATION NEEDED FOR INCORPORATING A
* 3380 MAPPPING CAPABILITY INTO IEHMAP
*
* THE MODIFICATION WAS ACCOMPLISHED BY MODIFYING A DEVICE TAPE IN
* THE MAPDEV CSECT OF IEHMAP.
*
* EACH LEVEL OF THE TAPE IS MAPDEV IS FORMATTED AS FOLLOWS:
*
*             FIELD NAME                      BYTES
*      DEVICE TYPE                              0
*      DEVICE DESCRIPTION                      1-15
*      SCALE FACTORS FOR CCHH OF DEVICE       16-23
*      NUMBER OF TRACKS PER CYLINDER          24-25
*      MAX RELATIVE TRACK FOR DEVICE          26-27
*
* THE 28 BYTES GIVEN BELOW REPRESENT THE SPECIFIC INFORMATION REQUIRED
* BY IEHMAP TO MAP 3380 DASD. A TABLE ENTRY FOR A DEVICE NO LONGER IN
* USE WAS OVERLAID WITH THIS DATA, THEREBY ELIMINATING ANY NEED TO
* EXTEND THE TABLE
*
*   BYTES                  HEX                     DEC
*     0          OE
*    1-15        F3F3F8F040C4C9E2D240D7C1C3D240    3380 DISK PACK
*   16-23        000F,000F,0001,0001               15,15,1,1
*   24-25        000F                              15
*   26-27        33DB                              13275
*
* THIS LEVEL WILL DELETE 2314 SUPPORT AND ADD 3380 SUPPORT
*
*
 DUMPT IEHMAP MAPDEV
 NAME IEHMAP MAPDEV
 VER 001C  08                          DEVICE TYPE
 VER 001D  F2F3F1F440                  DEVICE DESCRIPTION
 VER 002C  0000001400000001            SCAL FACTORS FOR CCHH OF DEVICE
 VER 0034  0014                        NUMBER OF TRACKS/PER CYL
 VER 0036  0FA0                        MAX RELATIVE TRACK FOR DEVICE
 REP 001C  0E                          DEVICE TYPE
 REP 001D  F3F3F8F040                  DEVICE DESCRIPTION
 REP 002C  000F000F00010001            SCAL FACTORS FOR CCHH OF DEVICE
 REP 0034  000F                        NUMBER OF TRACKS/PER CYL
 REP 0036  33DB                        MAX RELATIVE TRACK FOR DEVICE
 DUMPT IEHMAP MAPDEV

ZAP9.text:
NAME IEHMAPIN IEHMAPIN
*
* USE OF THE L=, MIN=, MAX= PARAMETERS RESULTS IN S0C1 DUE TO
*     USING THE BASE REGISTER 6 AS A WORK REGISTER
*     THIS ZAP FIXES THAT PROBLEM
*
  VER 0248 5520,B3D0                 ORIG INSTR
  REP 0248 47F0,C8F0                 B TO PATCH AREA
  REP 08F0 5860,D004                 GET PREVIOUS SAVE AREA
  REP 08F4 5860,602C                 REFRESH WITH ORIG CONTENTS
  REP 08F8 5520,B3D0                 OVERLAID INSTR
  REP 08FC 47F0,C24C                 RETURN
